amuse.nodes.trainer
Class TrainerNodeScheduler

java.lang.Object
  amuse.interfaces.nodes.NodeScheduler
      amuse.nodes.trainer.TrainerNodeScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeEventSource, NodeSchedulerInterface, java.lang.Runnable
public class TrainerNodeScheduler
extends NodeScheduler

TrainerNodeScheduler is responsible for the trainer node. The labeled music files are used for the training of classification model.
